title: Open university: the curriculum - context, design and development course
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Open University and Gwyn Pritchard
brief_description: The concept of openness in higher education is examined. The film looks at the Open Admissions Policy at the City University of New York. It focuses on the implications for a university of having an open admissions policy. In particular the film examines how the abandonment of traditional selection practices affects the curriculum of the university.
